Package br.ufrn.imd.dao

Class MusicDao

java.lang.Object
br.ufrn.imd.dao.MusicDao
public class MusicDao extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing interactions with the files that store the songs.
Since:
3/12/2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
Davi Matias, Jose Maia

    • loadSong

      public Music loadSong(String path)
      Method that loads a song selected by the user.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to the directory where the song is stored.
      Returns:
      The song corresponding to the given path.

      Parameters:
      directoryPath - The path to the directory where the songs are stored.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList with all the loaded songs.

      Returns:
      An ArrayList with all the loaded songs.

    • loadSongs

      public void loadSongs()
      Method that loads all songs saved, both in the selected directories and specifically saved by the user.

    • saveSong

      public boolean saveSong(Music song)
      A method that manages song saving in disk.
      Parameters:
      song - The song to be saved.
      Returns:
      True when the song was correctly saved, false otherwise.

    • deleteSong

      public boolean deleteSong(Music song)
      A method that manages song deleting from file loading data.
      Parameters:
      song - The song that will be deleted.
      Returns:
      True when the song was correctly deleted, false otherwise.

    • addDirectory

      public Boolean addDirectory(String path)
      A method that stores a directory on disk for further music loading.
      Parameters:
      path - The directory to be saved.
      Returns:
      True when the directory was inserted, false if any errors occured or if the directory was already added.

    • removeDirectory

      public boolean removeDirectory(String path)
      A method that removes a specific directory.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the directory to be removed.
      Returns:
      boolean true if the directory has been removed correctly, false otherwise.

    • removeAllDirectories

      public void removeAllDirectories(Collection<String> directories)
      A method that removes all the specified directories.
      Parameters:
      directories - The directories to be removed.
